Description

KVLT is an episodic Retro Shooter set in a obscure and grim version of WW2. KVLT is brutal and visceral, like your favorite 90's shooters, with a deep focus on level exploration and fast paced combat.

History

You are Lazar, an occultist and cold blooded mercenary, fighting to unveil the eldritch secrets that hide beyond the war theater.

Features

  • Explore a grim and unique version of WW2
  • Fast paced combat
  • Wield forgotten weaponary from WW2 and ancient artifacts. Cast obscure Eldritch spells
  • Fight your way through armies of Nazis, Cults, Religious Fanatic and Eldritch Abominations
